# 사진은 행렬이다

## 랜덤으로 0에서 1미만의 소수 구하기 : np.random.rand()

::: {#2d0c96d0 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

np.random.seed(2024)
img1 = np.random.rand(3,3)
img1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1}
```
array([[0.58801452, 0.69910875, 0.18815196],
       [0.04380856, 0.20501895, 0.10606287],
       [0.72724014, 0.67940052, 0.4738457 ]])
```
:::
:::


::: {#2766d173 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
plt.imshow(img1, cmap='gray', interpolation='nearest')
plt.colorbar()
plt.show()
```
